channel.title: Anime on Game Vibe
channel.description: Recent content in Anime on Game Vibe

item.title: Tomba! 2: The Evil Swine Return Special Edition
item.description: Game Description Tomba! 2: The Evil Swine Return Special Edition is a special edition that offers a fresh look at the often overlooked sequel to the legendary platformer. The process of passing has been significantly simplified due to modern innovations. The save anywhere function is now available, eliminating the need to look for special places to record progress. There is also an option to rewind time, allowing you to undo an unsuccessful action or a missed jump.

item.title: Toy Smash Kaboom!
item.description: Game Description Toy Smash Kaboom! is a hybrid project that combines elements of spatial organization, auto-battler and physical clashes. The playing field is a littered table on which you will have to command armies of animated toys. Squads are managed through a backpack-like inventory system, where each slot has strategic importance for the outcome of the upcoming battle. The troops can be led by unique captains, such as the Chef Doll, who specializes in defense, or Doctor Hamster, who relies on the numerical superiority of his charges.

item.title: Nano Neighbors
item.description: Game Description Nano Neighbors is a life simulator in which your computer desktop turns into a cozy home for the friendly android NANO. The project offers to take on the role of a Handler, responsible for the development and well-being of his digital companion. The small robot is constantly located at the bottom of the screen, reacting to human actions and creating a feeling of constant presence. Social interaction is an important part of the gameplay: you can invite your friends to visit NANO, visit their capsule houses, or meet in common centers for communication and joint activities.

item.title: Alice's World
item.description: Game Description Alices World is a story-driven 2D adventure in which the gamer plays an unusual role. There is no place for role-playing here, because the player acts as himself - the voice that the main character hears from behind the screen. A girl named Alice, waking up in a world filled with death, is completely dependent on instructions from the outside. You can be an honest guide or a deceiver, help or deliberately lead to death.

item.title: DYSTHANASIA
item.description: Game Description DYSTHANASIA is a depressing project, plunging into an atmosphere of total despair and madness. The setting is a gloomy research complex, where the main character comes to her senses within the walls of a cold morgue. The surroundings, with uncured bloodstains and unidentified remains of flesh, clearly hint at a recent tragedy. The space is filled with inhuman moans emitted by grotesque creatures that mercilessly pursue the protagonist. Any mistake in this hostile world leads to instant and cruel death.

item.title: Galaxy Princess Zorana
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Princess Zorana is a strategic life simulator, the main task of which is to conquer the throne of the Heavenly Empire after the sudden death of your father. The previously carefree life of the second heir to the throne, known for her love of beautiful shoes and pets, is changing dramatically. After the death of his mother and the betrayal of his brother, who was considered a prince, the emperor disappears under mysterious circumstances.

item.title: Berserk B.I.T.S
item.description: Game Description Berserk BITS is a hybrid project that invites you to take on the role of a network detective. The main goal is to uncover the conspiracy behind a series of virus attacks that are shaking cyberspace. Progress along the storyline occurs through completing tasks received from email. During the investigations, you will explore a variety of digital biomes, fighting viruses and defeating powerful bosses. A key ally in this mission is a personal digital companion named B.

item.title: Daisen
item.description: Game Description Daisen is a fast-paced first-person shooter that tells the story of the fate of a girl who finds herself at the center of a mysterious anomaly spreading. The protagonist is Emilia Svitanko, an ordinary girl who inevitably becomes a tool for containing chaos. She will have to figure out the reasons for the anomalous influence that has engulfed the surrounding lands. A key feature of the combat system is the complete absence of ammunition and reloading.

item.title: HoloCafe
item.description: Game Description HoloCafe is a management simulator in which the player takes on the role of a manager and saves a small establishment from ruin. The plot takes place in an alternate universe, where instead of a VTuber agency, a cafe was opened, but the business quickly fell into disrepair. When the situation began to seem hopeless, virtual idols appear from a mysterious portal, ready to help restore business. The gamer has at his disposal a staff of 17 talents representing the Japanese, English and Indonesian divisions of Hololive.

item.title: ZAKO NO AHIRU
item.description: Game Description ZAKO NO AHIRU is a 2D platformer of increased difficulty, the main goal of which is to conquer an inaccessible peak to the accompaniment of caustic comments. Every action is tirelessly watched by a girl named Sugaki Mary, who lives next door. She’s ready to make a caustic remark or an inappropriate joke at any time, using an arsenal of more than 800 fully voiced lines. The reward for your patience and skill will be one of 7 endings, each of which represents a unique surreal situation, reminiscent of a dream.

item.title: BIRDCAGE
item.description: Game Description BIRDCAGE is a fast-paced bullet hell shooter where gameplay focuses on unique sword mechanics to fend off attacks and destroy enemies. The project takes inspiration from the arcade classics of the 90s, offering a polished combat system and stylized graphics. The pilot is required not only to dodge hundreds of projectiles, but also to actively use the blade to break through enemy squadrons. The title requires high concentration and sharp reflexes to survive in the chaos of battles.

item.title: Demonschool
item.description: Game Description Demonschool brings a new twist to tactical RPGs by making movement the core of your strategy. You lead Faye and her team through trials that blur the lines between the human and demon worlds. All this happens on a mysterious island where school life takes a demonic turn. A key mechanic allows you to rewind actions while planning, creating complex combos to defeat pesky enemies. This rewind feature adds a layer of challenge, forcing you to strategize like a chess grandmaster to outsmart your enemies.

item.title: Fatal Claw
item.description: Game Description Fatal Claw is a dark 2D metroidvania that asks you to take control of a mysterious cat named Keesha, resurrected after death. The protagonist will have to master a combat system based on the use of mystical claws to confront the terrible creatures that have infested the underground world. As you progress, new mutant abilities are unlocked, allowing you to climb walls, make rapid dashes, and even soar in the air.

item.title: ANIWARS: Call of the Void
item.description: Game Description ANIWARS: Call of the Void is a turn-based strategy game set in a world ravaged by endless and violent conflict. The global confrontation between three dominant factions creates an arena for intense tactical battles, where every move is critical to the outcome of the battle. Victory in these clashes requires the commander to carefully plan his actions and wisely use all available resources provided by the harsh reality of this world.

item.title: Chill with You: Lo-Fi Story
item.description: Game Description Chill with You: Lo-Fi Story immerses you in a world where the main goal is to establish a deep emotional connection with Satone, a gifted and imaginative girl who devotes herself to writing stories. Progress in relationships directly depends on the time spent working together at the same table. Each break turns into a valuable opportunity for communication, allowing you to get to know the young writer better and strengthen the budding friendship.

item.title: Beyond R: Rule Ripper
item.description: Game Description Beyond R: Rule Ripper is a visual novel that places ten strangers in a ruthless game of survival. Finding themselves locked in the mysterious Golden Jack bar, they learn from the mysterious Boss that they have been poisoned. The only chance of salvation lies in following the rules or breaking them completely, setting the stage for a tense psychological thriller. The ultimate goal for each of the captives is to survive until there are three or fewer people left alive.

item.title: INAZUMA ELEVEN: Victory Road
item.description: Game Description INAZUMA ELEVEN: Victory Road opens up the possibility of collecting over 5,400 characters from the history of the franchise under your command, which becomes a reality in Chronicles mode. Together with Victorio, a boy from the future, you can relive iconic matches of the past, forming a dream team of legendary football players capable of crushing any opponent. This mode takes a deep dive into the series' legacy, recreating iconic rivalries and opening up new tactical options using classic lineups.

item.title: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy DX
item.description: Game Description Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends and the Secret Fairy DX offers an expanded version of the adventure, allowing you to take control of Empel and Leela in their own storyline. The events of this expanded edition take place 3 years after the finale of the first part, when the matured Raizalin Shtout goes to the capital city of Ashra-am-Berd. At the request of a friend, she takes on the task of investigating a mysterious stone, which soon turns out to be an egg.

item.title: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key DX
item.description: Game Description Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End and the Secret Key DX marks the end of the story of alchemist Raizalin Stout, who must unravel the mystery of the suddenly appeared Kark Islands. These mysterious lands threaten the stability of her home island of Kurken, forcing the girl to embark on one last great journey. A voice in her head guides Reiza to create mysterious keys that open up not only new possibilities in the synthesis of objects, but also access to previously unseen areas for exploration.

item.title: Junji Ito Maniac: An Infinite Gaol
item.description: Game Description Junji Ito Maniac: An Infinite Gaol plunges you into a nightmare where floating ball heads and inexorably crawling black hair on the walls are just part of the terrifying reality. At the center of this madness is college student Yota Takahashi, who wakes up in an ominous Western-style mansion with no memories of his past. The only clues are a broken smartphone and scattered fragments of thoughts. This place, filled with strange statues and hidden mechanisms, becomes a personal prison, and the first-person view makes you feel the oppressive atmosphere and every step deeper into the surreal world.

item.title: Million Depth
item.description: Game Description Million Depth offers a unique tactical experience where survival is directly dependent on the ability to manage time. The main character, Moma, has a device known as a biotope jammer, which allows her to completely freeze a moment while she herself remains motionless. This mechanic becomes the basis of the combat system: dangerous creatures hiding in the shadows of dungeons make their move only after the actions of the protagonist.

item.title: HoloSeeker
item.description: Game Description HoloSeeker is a card roguelike with RPG elements, the main goal of which is to conquer the adventure map with the help of a well-built deck. Players will have to choose one of four available characters, each of which has its own fighting style. Initially, only Usada Pekora is available, using the Carrot accumulation mechanic to gain an advantage. As you progress, other talents are unlocked: Nekomata Okayu, who relies on high evasion with low defense, Takanashi Kiara, who is able to revive after death thanks to Phoenix Feathers, as well as the FuwaMoco duo, which accumulates the Mischief Stock resource to play powerful cards.

item.title: Yes, My Queen
item.description: Game Description Yes, My Queen is a tactical strategy game where magic and absurd tricks break the canonical rules of chess. To break free from captivity, you will have to defeat a chain of opponents in a series of fights, whose power is constantly increasing, which will require both a sharp mind and a willingness to disregard the foundations. There are over forty different cards at your disposal, the use of which can radically change the situation on the board.

item.title: Mecha Blitz
item.description: Game Description Mecha Blitz is an anime-inspired, isometric top-down shooter where players build mechs and engage in chaotic arena battles. The process of creating your own mech, called an Arbiter, offers access to over 100 parts, internal components and weapons. In addition to extensive cosmetic options, there is an upgrade system to improve equipment, abilities and characteristics. The depth of tactical capabilities is revealed through the creation of unique builds. You can design both a mobile but vulnerable vehicle and a heavily armored fortress, which directly affects the style of combat.

item.title: Majogami
item.description: Game Description Majogami is a fast-paced 2D adventure in which players hack their way through a nightmarish world using unique abilities for instant movement and attacks. The main character, armed with the Kamikiri katana, is able to quickly close the distance with enemies, cutting them into pieces thanks to the Setsuna mechanics. The same ability is used to overcome obstacles and evade enemy attacks, turning every collision into a swift dance of blades.

item.title: Service with a Shotgun
item.description: Game Description Service with a Shotgun plunges you into an absurd reality where retail rules apply even during a zombie apocalypse. The main task becomes not only survival among the hordes of the undead, but also high-quality service to the eccentric customers lining up at the half-empty shelves. While the living dead are wandering outside the window, a real drama is unfolding inside the store: you need to speak quickly, shoot accurately and build defensive structures in order to survive the next work shift.

item.title: Cooking Clash
item.description: Game Description Cooking Clash invites you to try on the role of a chef and owner of a noisy diner in virtual reality format. The main task becomes not only masterful cooking, but also managing real chaos. The establishment attracts the most bizarre visitors, among whom there are not only people, but also various animals with their own strange requests. In addition, you have to constantly be on guard, because some guests are not averse to stealing other people’s tips.

item.title: RazePact
item.description: Game Description A fast-paced action-platformer hybrid, RazePact takes gamers into a dark dungeon inspired by classics of the genre. A small wandering soul named Soul falls under control, seeking answers to questions about his past and origin. Her journey is not just an attempt to break free, but a way to discover herself and uncover the secrets of a mysterious place. On the path to the truth, the heroine will have to face numerous opponents, where each battle makes the spirit stronger, gradually bringing her closer to the solution.

item.title: Silly Polly Beast
item.description: Game Description Silly Polly Beast is a dive into a nightmarish and often abstract underground world shrouded in a deadly fog. In this ominous dimension, the main character will have to adapt to cruel rules in order to survive. A special bracelet serves as the only indicator of danger, lighting up red when approaching a destructive haze. You can move around creepy locations not only on foot, but also with the help of a skateboard, which is also used as a weapon for close combat.

item.title: Toziuha Night: Order of the Alchemists
item.description: Game Description Toziuha Night: Order of the Alchemists invites gamers into a world full of danger, secrets and a thirst for revenge. This 2D side-scrolling action platformer offers a fast-paced mix of elements, combining Metroidvania exploration with combat and character development. The game’s protagonist, Xandria, is not an ordinary hero. As an Iron Alchemist, she uses her mastery of the chemical elements to battle her enemies and achieve her ultimate goal of revenge.

item.title: Love Craft
item.description: Game Description Love Craft is a dating simulator where the search for a soulmate is based on the principle of selection within a creative circle. Events take place within the walls of Cubiversity University, where the protagonist arrives as a new student. The central element of the story is joining the prestigious Handicraft Club. Here you will have to form a working group of 5 candidates, choosing them from 15 available classmates.

item.title: OLAPU
item.description: Game Description OLAPU is a test for a well-coordinated team, challenging raid bosses whose mechanics are reminiscent of large-scale battles in MMORPGs. Defeating opponents like Guardian Seraphina or Empress Elisera will require not only perfect knowledge of attack patterns, but also impeccable coordination. Each successful foray into the Valley of Elisera is rewarded, allowing you to unlock permanent upgrades, legendary gear with semi-random stats, and even new characters for future runs.

item.title: UltraGirl Alters
item.description: Game Description UltraGirl Alters is a tactical project in which the gamer controls a group of virtual idols, Alters, fighting the creations of corporate algorithms. Five girls, dressed in tokusatsu-style battle suits, confront monsters on live-streamed battlefields. The outcome of each clash is determined not only by the competent use of the heroines’ unique abilities, but also by the reaction of the audience to the actions of the commander. Accumulating SP points gives you access to ultimate attacks that can destroy entire squads of enemies or deal devastating damage to bosses.

item.title: FULL METAL SCHOOLGIRL
item.description: Game Description FULL METAL SCHOOLGIRL is a satirical depiction of the future, where two cybernetically enhanced schoolgirls must storm the hundred-story skyscraper of a giant corporation. Inside a building whose structure changes with each new entry, the heroines Akemi and Ryoko are confronted by legions of corporate slaves turned into cyborgs. These weak-willed fighters, known as the Working Dead, defend their employer’s interests to the last spark of life, attacking in waves and relying on numerical superiority.

item.title: Maid of Salvation
item.description: Game Description Maid of Salvation is a dark fantasy adventure where the dynamics of fast-paced battles are intertwined with the exploration of mysterious locations. The combat system is built on a skillful combination of swords, firearms and special moves, requiring sharp reflexes to dodge, parry and launch surprise attacks. You will have to confront more than 20 powerful bosses and hordes of demonic creatures known as Fiends that have infested Purgatory.

item.title: Dispatch
item.description: Game Description Dispatch takes the superhero genre and turns it on its head, placing it in the mundane yet unpredictable world of office life. Instead of fighting evil aliens or saving cities, the title follows Robert Robertson, a former superhero called Mecha Man, who is now forced to find his place in a superhero control center after his trusty mech suit is destroyed in a fight with his nemesis. So what?

item.title: House Builder 2
item.description: Game Description House Builder 2 is a simulation game in which the building process begins with careful planning and preparation. Before laying the first stone in the foundation, you have to go to the warehouse to get the necessary tools and materials. After loading everything onto his truck, the player goes anywhere in the vast open world to begin fulfilling the order. The developers have focused on advanced construction mechanics, which provide high precision and control over every stage of work, from the construction of walls to the smallest interior details.

item.title: Fantasy Maiden Wars - DREAM OF THE STRAY DREAMER -
item.description: Game Description Fantasy Maiden Wars DREAM OF THE STRAY DREAMER is a tactical role-playing project, the events of which take place in a world called Genshokyo, where gods, people and supernatural creatures youkai exist together. The story begins with a series of mysterious incidents that upset the fragile balance of this region. To understand the causes of the growing chaos, two heroines, the priestess Reimu Hakurei and the sorceress Marisa Kirisame, set off on a long journey.

item.title: Touhou Dystopian
item.description: Game Description Touhou Dystopian is a fast-paced adventure that puts control in the hands of one of four heroines, each with a unique fighting style. The fate of the protagonists is in the hands of the gamer, who can develop their talents and discover new improvements. There are about 100 different power-up abilities available in the arsenal, allowing you to choose individual tactics for each battle. Among the playable characters are such famous heroines as Flandre Scarlet, Youmu and Mokou, which makes it possible to look at events from different angles.

item.title: GHOST TRAVELER: Adventures in Edo
item.description: Game Description GHOST TRAVELER: Adventures in Edo is a mystical visual novel that follows the investigation into a series of brutal murders set against the backdrop of Japan’s Yoshiwara entertainment district. The main character is a 17-year-old boy named Kotaro, whose soul, after a supernatural incident in modern Shibuya, is transported to the 19th century. Having learned from a certain deity about the death of his physical body, the protagonist finds himself locked in the past with no clear path to returning home or moving on to the afterlife.

item.title: Water of M
item.description: Game Description Water of M is a psychological horror game in which the main goal is to uncover the dark secrets of an unusual educational institution. The protagonist awakens in the middle of dark corridors, having no memories of his past, but discovering traces of blood on his hands. This discovery raises the main question: is he a victim of circumstances or the perpetrator of some terrible event. The atmosphere of oppressive silence and constantly flickering light turn classrooms and halls that are familiar at first glance into deadly labyrinths.

item.title: Ys vs. Trails in the Sky: Alternative Saga
item.description: Game Description Ys vs Trails in the Sky Alternative Saga is a dynamic crossover that unites characters from two famous universes, Ys and The Legend of Heroes. The legendary adventurer Adol Christin, his faithful companion Dogi and other heroes from the world of the franchise find themselves drawn into mysterious events that take them to the mysterious country of Xanadu. At the same time, Estelle Bright, Joshua Bright and their comrades from Liberl find themselves in the same world.

item.title: Rise Eterna 2
item.description: Game Description Rise Eterna 2 offers you to take control of Yacht, a soldier of the Atrakian Empire, whose goal is to return the former power to his state. The story continues the narrative of the original several years later, plunging the gamer into the epicenter of a conflict for the throne between two influential houses. The situation is complicated by a mysterious third faction, hatching a plan for final retribution and weaving its own intrigues.

item.title: Yomegami: My Sweet Goddess
item.description: Game Description Yomegami My Sweet Goddess is a story about the difficult fate of Hayato Narukawa, whose new life suddenly turns into a series of comical and awkward situations. A sudden kiss with Ichijiku Mikoto, the daughter of the head of a local crime syndicate, jeopardizes his deepest mission. Now the protagonist will have to find a common language not only with the mafia heiress, but also with the clumsy class leader, as well as with a naive girl with dog ears.

item.title: Disaster Arms - Impact Project B.A.H.N.
item.description: Game Description Disaster Arms Impact Project B.A.H.N. - The story of a lonely soldier named Gveral, whose vengeful chase unfolds on the threshold of the global apocalypse. The world stands on the edge of death due to an alien invasion provoked by the ruthless experiments of the Kaisercorps corporation. The past of the gover, known as the “empty soldier”, is revealed through the non -linear narration, presented in the form of stylized comics, immersing in the gloomy atmosphere of the coming anti -utopia.

item.title: Dream Abyss: Survivors
item.description: Game Description Dream Abyss Survivors is a spontaneous role-playing adventure that immerses brave heroines in a surreal dream world, where they must fight back endless waves of nightmarish creatures. Each foray into the depths of the nightmare becomes a unique challenge thanks to an extensive progression system. Gamers create a variety of fighting styles by combining 65 skills, 17 variable characteristics and 23 power-up cards. Countless hordes of monsters and powerful bosses are destroyed by one of four selectable protagonists, each of whom has a unique set of abilities and a special style of combat in this vibrant anime fantasy.

item.title: Murder Is Game Over: Murder Otaku
item.description: Game Description Murder Is Game Over Murder Otaku is a mysterious incident at the pop culture convention YokaiKon, where a detective duo must unravel a mysterious crime. The main characters, Detective Guy and his faithful dog Cleo, arrive at the historic 1920s hotel that serves as the venue for the event. Their mission begins after the tragic death of a famous J-pop singer, whose death shrouds the noisy event in an ominous mystery.

item.title: Syrup and the Ultimate Sweet
item.description: Game Description Syrup and the Ultimate Sweet is a visual novel where failure to create a magical dessert sets off a chain of unpredictable events. The conflict flares up when the main character Syrup, who fundamentally does not use magic in confectionery, rejects the idea of ​​​​creating the so-called Ideal Sweetness. This decision prompts a living candy golem named Gumdrop to escape from the workshop. In her search for the necessary magical ingredients, she joins forces with Butterscotch, Syrup’s longtime rival, complicating an already difficult situation for all parties involved.

item.title: Rose of Wind
item.description: Game Description Rose of Wind offers to take care of an old tavern inherited from his grandfather. This once flourished institution now needs a caring hand to restore its reputation and again make the center of attraction for travelers. A variety of guests will knock on the door, from tired merchants to brave adventurers, each with his own fate. The atmosphere depends on the decisions of the manager: you can feed them added to them, provide an overnight stay or support the conversation at the hearth.

item.title: Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist and the White Guardian
item.description: Game Description Atelier Resleriana: The Red Alchemist and the White Guardian takes place in Halfain, a city recovering years after its inhabitants mysteriously disappeared. The two main characters, Rias and Slade, return to their homelands with different goals. The girl wants to reopen her grandfather’s shop, and the boy wants to find out more about the things his father left him. Together they try to uncover the mystery of what happened, while simultaneously working on the revival of the settlement.

item.title: PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC
item.description: Game Description PAC-MAN WORLD 2 Re-PAC takes the main character on a journey through the diverse regions of PAC-LAND. The adventure begins after the Ghosts steal the Golden Fruit from PAC-Village, inadvertently releasing a powerful ghost king named Spooky. The key task is to return the stolen artifacts and defeat the antagonist to restore order. The mission begins in an expanded village that serves as a central location from which gamers set out to explore the larger world.

item.title: Forsaker: Dingding and Blade
item.description: Game Description Forsaker: Dingding and Blade begins with a regular mission for two young men, which develops into a Cannibal Odyssey on the Hel continent. The local world is divided into three fractions: people, the Church of the Divine Body and the devouring flesh of the outcasts. Players explore this society, constantly faced with the main choice: to eat another or become prey. The plot reveals deep conspiracies and casts doubt on the established order and the very nature of survival.

item.title: Mamorukun ReCurse!
item.description: Game Description In Mamorukun ReCurse! the summoned souls, together with the main character, end up in the mysterious Underworld. A local priestess reports that the opening gates to the Dark Dimension are sending a curse on the inhabitants of this kingdom. The assembled characters are tasked with cleaning up the locals to prevent disaster. Joining forces is their only chance to return home, which sends the heroes on a journey through a strange land full of possessed enemies.

item.title: This Be Mutiny
item.description: Game Description This Be Mutiny is a tactical adventure centered around betrayal and infighting among the team. At the center of the story is a squad of 11 colorful characters united by a common goal, but everyone’s personal ambitions lead to inevitable rebellion. The gameplay is built on complex decisions, forcing the user to constantly choose which of his teammates to keep on the team and which to mercilessly throw overboard.

item.title: Touhou Makuka Sai ~ Fantastic Danmaku Festival Part III
item.description: Game Description In Touhou Makuka Sai ~ Fantastic Danmaku Festival Part 3, a conspiracy related to the strange moon above Gansko is revealed. During the annual festival of mid -autumn, the lunar exhibition is unusually lively. With the sunrise of the full moon, a huge curtain stops the movement of the night sky to the ground. This phenomenon lures numerous Yokaev - creatures, previously known only by rumors interested in a passing banquet.

item.title: Wander Stars
item.description: Game Description In Wander Stars, martial artist Ringo and a scoundrel named Wolf work together to search for pieces of a legendary map across the universe. Their alliance becomes the basis for the search for Ringo’s brother and the discovery of the secrets of Wolfe’s past - a story told in 10 separate episodes. This space adventure involves forming alliances with a variety of characters, gradually creating a real family. The plot touches on themes of mystery, betrayal and redemption as the duo travels between worlds.

item.title: Marisa of Liartop Mountain
item.description: Game Description Marisa of Liartop Mountain begins with Reimu’s search for her missing friend, a quest that leads the heroine to a mysterious book. This book serves as a portal into a literary world inhabited by strange inhabitants. Inside, Reimu encounters a devastated version of Marisa, openly questioning her own identity and purpose. The main task is to go through this symbolic landscape, a mountain of lies reflecting the friend’s internal conflict, in order to reveal the truth and help her return.

item.title: Sora no Kiseki the 1st
item.description: Game Description Sora no Kiseki the 1st follows Estelle and Joshua on their first journey through the Kingdom of Liberl. As junior Bracers, defenders of peace in the region, they travel between cities, carrying out assignments and resolving local conflicts. This activity serves as training for them, but their wanderings are also prompted by the disappearance of their father, Cassius. Along their journey, the heroes meet new allies and experience important partings, while a great destiny gradually unfolds before them.

item.title: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter
item.description: Game Description Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter follows Estelle Bright and her half-brother Joshua as they begin their journey in the peacekeeping guild. Their initial task is to earn recognition by completing various tasks. A seemingly simple task in the Kingdom of Liberl gradually reveals a difficult political situation. The pair soon discover that their personal ambitions are intertwined with the stability of the state, forcing the heroes to face challenges beyond their training.

item.title: Deadeye Deepfake Simulacrum
item.description: Game Description Deadeye Deepfake Simulacrum stands out against the background of similar projects due to specific visual design and design. Here, as the protagonist, is a cybernetic corporate agent who has to go through a series of tests in order to get to the bottom of the truth. Each step here needs to be carefully weighed, because only one enemy bullet can finish the journey of the hero. But everything is not so bad, because he has his trump cards in his sleeve, and it is at the expense of them that he will be able to get an advantage over opponents.

item.title: Goblin Cleanup
item.description: Game Description Goblin Cleanup will turn over the idea of ​​the classic Dungeon Crawler genre. Forget about the extermination of dragons and the plunder of treasures - here you yourself put things in order. Take the role of a professional cleaner of the dungeons, who is instructed to restore order after a group of violent adventure seekers arranged a pogrom here. This is not an ordinary cleaning simulator. Time management is a key moment.

item.title: HYKE: Northern Light(s)
item.description: Game Description HYKE: Northern Light(s) follows the young witch HYKE as she searches for her mother in a world ravaged by a long-ago war. Following in the footsteps of her mother, she finds herself in the unexplored Forbidden Lands. This dangerous territory is guarded by the guardian witches Meteos. Meeting them becomes a turning point in the heroine’s fate, forcing her to confront the legacy of the conflict between humans and magical creatures, as well as her family’s role in these events.

item.title: I Hate My Waifu Streamer
item.description: Game Description In I Hate My Waifu Streamer, the gamer will have to capture the attention of the streamer before other viewers. The main goal is to interact with a girl named Mio during her live broadcasts. Communication is based on writing chat messages and sending donations to stand out among other subscribers. This competition for recognition forms the basis of the gameplay, and financial support becomes a key way to develop relationships and attract Mio’s interest.

item.title: Ratatan
item.description: Game Description The creatures of Ratatan begin a journey together to a place called The Everafter. According to legend, the Goddess lives in this distant land, and meeting her has become a common goal for all the bestial inhabitants of the island. Despite their differences in appearance and character, they are united by this desire. The heroes set out on a journey from their busy home, prepared for numerous attempts and failures on the way to their dream, which they will never give up.

item.title: Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree
item.description: Game Description Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree begins with how the priestess of the goods collects its associates to protect the village of Shinju from the advancing evil. She has to lead the guards against the forces of the Magatz - the essence that threatens the distant mystical world. The main task is to restore peace, exploring dangerous lands, whose splendor hides numerous threats. The adventure covers several temporary lines, during which the detachment is fighting for the future of his house.

item.title: Type-NOISE: Shonen Shojo
item.description: Game Description Type-NOISE: Shonen Shojo takes place in a familiar but altered version of Tokyo, where six teenagers who have lost their memories gather. Locked in the city, they are forced to wander through bizarre labyrinths in search of a way out. The only way forward lies through the restoration of lost memories, revealing the sealed pages of the past. The main goal is not just an escape from physical captivity, but a meeting with the real you, forgotten for a good reason.

item.title: Troublemaker 2: Beyond Dream
item.description: Game Description In Troublemaker 2: Beyond Dream, the story takes place in South Jakarta two years after the ending of the original game. The plot follows the intertwined destinies of the Parakacuk gang and the music group Beyond Dream as they pursue their own ambitions. The central conflict revolves around uncovering secrets surrounding drugs and conspiracies affecting the city’s youth. This game’s narrative combines action with elements of comedy, emotional drama and investigation.

item.title: M.A.S.S. Builder
item.description: Game Description M.A.S.S. Builder is a dynamic slasher game that allows you to completely customize your combat robot. The game allows you to create a unique Mechanical Assault Skeleton Suit (in the original - Mechanical Assault Skeleton Suit, abbreviated as MASS). You have to lead an army to protect humanity from an alien invasion. Don’t let the human race be destroyed and take the lives of your people into your own hands!

item.title: Chrono Gear: Warden of Time
item.description: Game Description The Chrono Gear: Warden of Time project immerses the player in the center of a temporary collapse provoked by the battle between the Guardian of Time Ouro Kronia and the demon Alter Laplus. During the collision, the artifact she created to stabilize realities, the Chrono Mechanism, was destroyed. Its fragments, the Golden Gears, scattered throughout the universe, which poses the main task for the gamer: to find them and restore the disturbed order.

item.title: Touhou Farming ~ Minoriko's Homestead Harvest
item.description: Game Description Touhou Farming ~ Minoriko’s Homestead Harvest challenges the harvest goddess Minoriko Aki to increase the number of her followers. In the world of Gensokyo, there is high competition among deities, so the heroine strives to provide food for the growing Human Settlement. Her main goal is to accumulate faith, which serves as a measure of popularity, by growing various crops, including a special sweet potato. All of these activities are carried out in conjunction with the Moriya Shrine to take advantage of the changes in the region.

item.title: Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion
item.description: Game Description Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion offers to pilot a fully customized fur arsenal around the open world of an alien planet, participating in battles on Earth and in the air. Gamers examine a variety of locations, including plains and mountains, moving on foot in armor, in flight or riding a horse. The gameplay is built on the confrontation with mechanical and organic enemies in order to extract their weapons and equipment.

item.title: EVERYBODY's Golf Hot Shots
item.description: Game Description EVERYBODY’s Golf Hot Shots is based on a system of three presses to make strokes on a variety of sites. You can compete both online and in offline mode, choosing from the list of available characters for going to the Fervey. The gameplay requires an accurate calculation of time for aiming and completing a sunk for the best result. This key mechanics are used in all available formats, providing a single control scheme, regardless of whether the competition goes alone or against opponents on the lawn.

item.title: SHUTEN ORDER
item.description: Game Description SHUTEN ORDER immerses gamers in the story of the resurrected founder of a religious nation, awakening without memories after being dismembered. He is given only 4 days to complete the divine test: to find and eliminate his own killer among 5 ministers. Events unfold in a world that has 168 days left to exist, against the backdrop of the rapid emergence of the Shuten Order as a new state.

item.title: Holo Hidden - My Lovely Fans Canat Beis Hidden
item.description: Game Description The gameplay in Holo Hidden - My Lovely Fans Can ‘CANT THIS HIDden takes place at 11 stages drawn by hand and 1 bonus level. Each scene is a large -scale illustration, which needs to find hundreds of certain objects and supporters. Search items vary from obvious to skillfully disguised in the scenery. These locations also contain numerous references to the presented personalities of Hololive, embedding thematic elements directly into the search riddles for fans.

item.title: Death end re;Quest: Code Z
item.description: Game Description Death end re;Quest: Code Z sends Sayaka Hiwatari into the Voltage Area, a parallel universe made up of deadly dungeons. These locations contain randomly generated monsters and traps that react to her actions. For every movement of the player character, hostile creatures respond with their own move to move or attack. The gameplay involves navigating the dungeon floors to find items and try to go deeper. In this reality, people who were once allies may now turn out to be enemies.

item.title: STORY OF SEASONS: Grand Bazaar
item.description: Game Description STORY OF SEASONS: Grand Bazaar immerses you in a new life in the town of Zephyr Town, with a focus on cultivating fields and raising livestock. The settlement’s central marketplace, once a global commercial hub, has fallen into disrepair. The key challenge is to restore this market square to its former glory. You have to collect the fruits of labor and create rare delicacies for sale at your own retail outlet, which directly contributes to the economic revival of Zephyr Town.

item.title: Quartet
item.description: Game Description Quartet immerses in the world in which incredible adventures and unforgettable battles await you. Start your way in the world of full mysteries, hidden government intrigues and powerful magic. In this fascinating and old -school RPG you can choose one of the four stories and go through them in any order, revealing the secrets of the Quartet world. A series of train robberies, a mysterious deck of cards, deadly aircraft and an accidental magician - all this awaits you in Quartet.

item.title: Turretgirls
item.description: Game Description Turretgirls offers to manage an operative with a turret reflecting the attacks of extraterrestrial forces from unstable wormholes. The main mission is to protect the generator, the only source of energy for planetary superweapies. Acting with a fixed rail platform, the heroine is opposed to the swarm of alien invaders that threaten the entire installation. The survival of the planet depends on this single defense against the invasion horde, since the retreat is impossible.

item.title: Wolf Mate
item.description: Game Description In Wolf Mate, a new student will have to explore the locked school in time, solving puzzles to escape from the heroine pursuing him named Freya. The narrative starts on the first day of the protagonist, introducing him to Freya - a classmate with an unusual aura. Because of the meeting with the teacher, the young man lingers until the evening and discovers the locked gates. In the walls of the darkened building, Freja occurs again, but her behavior acquires strange and threatening features, which becomes a tie for night incidents.

item.title: Dice Gambit
item.description: Game Description Step -by -step battles in Dice Gambit allow us to plunge into tactical competitions, where the victory determines the cubes that affect the management of the characters. The game is designed for strategic miscalculations where a variety and excitement makes a bone throw. Each result on dits permits to obtain a limited number of actions for heroes fighting on combat arenas. The characters will be able to move, perform interactions with the environment or inflict damage to the opponents on the field.

item.title: Journey of Realm: Dawn Dew
item.description: Game Description Journey of Realm: Dawn Dew gives control of a character named Dew on a journey of redemption. The adventure takes place in a kingdom consumed by a wave of black beasts and monstrous malice. As he progresses, Dew uncovers the history of the region, searching for the origins of a brutal threat. The plot explores a world where greed has destroyed innocence, prompting the heroine to arrive as a force to counteract the ongoing destruction.

item.title: Wagotabi: A Japanese Journey
item.description: Game Description Wagotabi: A Japanese Journey is a role-playing game designed to teach the Japanese language. The project offers speech acquisition through interactive dialogues and puzzle solving in a digital analogue of Japan. Progress is achieved through interaction with the environment and its inhabitants. The curriculum introduces hiragana, katakana, and kanji sequentially as vocabulary expands. This structure integrates language practice directly into gameplay, linking progression to linguistic understanding. In Wagotabi: A Japanese Journey, learning focuses on the practical application of vocabulary.

item.title: Liese in the City of Trials
item.description: Game Description Liese in the City of Trita puts the heroine Liz in the face of a new demonic threat years after the establishment of peace. In the former possessions of the defeated lord of demons, a fortress arises, flooding the city of weight in monsters. Liz arrives in a besieged metropolis to investigate the distress source. Local residents are facing inevitable danger, and it should act until the weight fell under the onslaught of the forces of darkness.

item.title: Earth
item.description: Game Description Earth is a site-scrolling space shooter created for 16-bit equipment. The project transfers the player the pilot of the warship Azuso Takanashi in her campaign against alien invaders. Its central goal is to protect the Earth in a series of combat scripts. This title is a 2D-player with the main character, whose events unfold in the futuristic science fiction universe. The gameplay is presented from the arcade perspective.

item.title: Flower in Us
item.description: Game Description Flower in Us features a narrative where the protagonist wakes up in a basement after a brutal attack that erases all personal memory. Nearby is a tied up young woman, in whose gaze one can read a familiar feeling that is unrequited for the player character. She recognizes the main character, but this recognition is not mutual, which immediately creates tension in a closed space. The first goal is to navigate this harsh environment and assess the current situation.

item.title: Yume Kakigori
item.description: Game Description Yume Kakigori is the story of a visitor from different times and places who finds solace in a secluded establishment located among the clouds. Each ice-cold dessert served determines the further development of the plot, opening new branches of dialogue and relationships. Objects and scattered notes left by guests serve as fragments of a large mosaic, by collecting which one can understand their past. Gradually, these details not only form a closer connection with each client, but also reveal the truth about this unusual world and its inhabitants.

item.title: The Great Villarance: Strategy of Lily
item.description: Game Description The Great Villarance: Strategy of Lily is a step -by -step tactical game about the Duchess of Scarlet, faced with accusation of regicide. Accused of the murder of the emperor, she concludes an alliance with Lily, the captain of the aircraft, a stream. Together they declare the war of the empire, becoming the first military streamers on the continent. The conflict grows due to a clash of impulsiveness and cold pragmatism.

item.title: and Roger
item.description: Game Description and Roger is an interactive novel that begins in the morning, deviating from the usual routine for the main character. Waking up, she discovers her father missing from their home. Instead, a man previously unknown to her is sleeping on the sofa in the living room. When he comes to, the stranger speaks in broken sentences and tells the girl to take medicine, showing sadness in his voice and ignoring her confusion.

item.title: Magical Girl Witch Trials
item.description: Game Description Magical Girl Witch Trials opens with high school student Emma awakening in a gloomy prison cell. She turns out to be one of 13 girls forcibly brought to a complex on a remote island. An owl appears and declares that a witch is hiding among them and must be found. The captives are told that they will spend the rest of their lives here if they fail to expose the culprit in a formal trial.

item.title: Demonic Mahjong
item.description: Game Description Demonic Mahjong races Majong bones with a horn structure. Players have to use chips from their hands to collect combinations that meet the established rules for counting glasses. However, the main task is beyond the scope of simple accumulation of points. The final goal is to build a hand and strategies that allow you to defeat the main boss, which turns every entry into preparation for the final battle.

item.title: SANAE's sylphid breeze
item.description: Game Description SANAE’s sylphid breeze is a 2D action platformer starring SANAE KOTHIYA from Touhou Project. The plot begins after an attack by an unknown person on Lady Kanako, the goddess of the Moriya Temple. In addition to this, the symbolic pillar of the shrine, the Onbashira, was stolen by the attacker. Suspects include the thief Marisa, business rivals from the Myouren Temple, and a certain Celestial. Sanae’s path is to investigate these clues to find the culprit and return the stolen artifact.

item.title: Dungeon Mori
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Mori begins with the return of monsters to the world, which has long expelled them. The main task of the player is to get rid of the lands of these creatures and the victory over the great eternal dragon. The research process is built on a choice system that determines the movement and events in the dungeons. The structure is based on step -by -step mechanics combined with solutions during the gameplay.

item.title: Dragonloop
item.description: Game Description Dragonloop is a metro-vanning that combines manipulations over time with the design of the map, enclosing a player in a repeating 5-day cycle. The main character is a woman who has lost her memory and trapped this temporary loop. Together with a satellite named Ouro, she travels around a two -dimensional world, where strange temporal changes take place. The basis of the gameplay is the study and battles in order to break out of the closed circle, change fate and reveal the truth about the situation.

item.title: Date EVERYTHING!
item.description: Game Description Date EVERYTHING! It begins after the main character loses his job due to artificial intelligence. Following this incident, a stranger delivers a parcel with glasses called DateViators. This accessory revives inanimate things in the dwelling of the protagonist, endowing them with his own character. The project contains a list of 100 potential partners, from bed to fire alarm, each of which is completely voiced. Through dialogues, the player studies the background and motives of these household objects that have now become his companions.

item.title: NITRO GEN OMEGA
item.description: Game Description NITRO GEN OMEGA imagines a world where machines dominate the landscape after humanity’s lost war. The surviving people huddle in cities built on giant pillars, so teams of mercenaries are forced to travel through dangerous wastelands. The player takes control of one of these squads, based on a flying ship to carry out tasks for the supply of resources and technologies. The task is to explore this world, lead a squad and control a combat mech.

item.title: Covenant of Solitude
item.description: Game Description Covenant of Solitude introduces the story of a young man named Fort, who secretly owns the gift to command monsters in a secluded settlement of the leaves. The carriers of such a force are called ginns - their fate is full of persecution, fear and exploitation from others. The familiar way of life of the hero breaks off when the war breaks into his house, flooding the streets with blood and forcing the fort to accept his essence.

item.title: Mystery Island: Missing Amy
item.description: Game Description Mystery Island: Missing Amy tells about the hell, the researcher, looking for sister, mysteriously missing months ago. The plot unfolds when hell receives a selfie from a loved one; The picture captures the missing girl on a remote island, where sea water has a bloody red color. This frame encourages hell to take a sea trip to search for a relative and study the location from a mysterious message.

item.title: Tales of Seikyu
item.description: Game Description Tales of Seikyu places players on an island retreat far from human lands and filled with magic. Yokai live here and can take on human form. In their homeland, gamers develop the land, contribute to the development of the city, and discover information about the island, as well as a long-lost family. The character uses transformation abilities to help manage the farm and explore the world around him.

item.title: gogh: Focus with Your Avatar
item.description: Game Description Gogh: Focus with Your Avatar combines focus tools and simulation gameplay mechanics, allowing you to create a character and design a location. Gamers interact with a virtual hero and a companion creature in a variable room. This project includes time management tools in addition to customization capabilities. The main task is to help with work sessions through a combination of these elements of the simulation game. In gogh: Focus with Your Avatar, a person arranges his own room by arranging furniture, choosing decor and choosing a palette.

item.title: Starvaders
item.description: Game Description Starvaders a combination of a mechanic of collecting a deck and step -by -step battles on the field in the setting of an alien invasion. The gamer takes control of the combat vehicle to fight the aliens with the help of compiled cards. The process moves through roguelike style visits, which requires adaptation. The task is to defend the Earth through the thoughtful use of maps and the placement of detachments on the field.

item.title: FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves
item.description: Game Description FATAL FURY: City of the Wolves is released as a new chapter in the fighting game series, 26 years after the release of the previous main part. This project includes mechanics that provide special offensive capabilities from the very beginning of the fight. It covers the moves REV Arts, REV Accel and REV Blows (with S.P.G. active), and its use is limited by the REV Meter, which overheats from intensive use.

item.title: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero
item.description: Game Description Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero introduces Marona, a young girl with the ability to communicate with the spirits of the departed. She travels through the oceanic game world of Ivoire with the ghost Ash, assisting residents along the way. Their travels are interrupted by an attack by a fleet of ghost ships, leading to Marona’s separation from Ash. This event kicks off her campaign against the sea aggressors.

item.title: It
item.description: Game Description IT’s on the Mouse combines a cafe management with a 3D platformer, providing players with control over the main characters of Holly. Being a tiny maid, she is forced to use a special navigation method in the working environment due to her growth. The gamer has to jump and run around the tables and racks to get to customers and submit orders to them. This movement system is central mechanics for receiving applications and delivery of the desired dishes.

item.title: MateEngine
item.description: Game Description MateEngine is a desktop program that projects an interactive 3D character onto the player’s screen. The project is created with support for the VRM model format, which allows gamers to import their own personalized avatars for display. These digital characters display a range of idle animations and can be physically moved to any location on the desktop by dragging the mouse. The avatar can also be placed directly on top of the active window, where it will remain and observe the user’s actions on the screen.

item.title: Promise Mascot Agency
item.description: Game Description Promise Mascot Agency offers the gamer to plunge into the life of Kaso-Machi, a damned Japanese town. The main character, Michi, is in exile and must establish the work of the agency of urban masks. Key tasks include hiring these creatures, resolving the problems that arise due to their actions, and clarifying the causes of the protagonist link. Communication with a kick, a living finger with a complex character, is also part of the gameplay while you are trying to make your agency the best in the region through the study of the world and plot events.

item.title: All in Abyss: Judge the Fake
item.description: Game Description All in Abyss: Judge the Fake introduces us to Asuha Senahara, a self-proclaimed gambling genius who seeks dominance in a special area where gambling rules. After challenging the ruling Witch of the gambling district, Asuha suffers her first defeat due to a mysterious power and falls into despair. Determined to take revenge, she begins an adventure of high-stakes poker, uncovering fraud, and amassing wealth. Her journey involves challenging her opponents to duels to the death, where either she or the Witches will die.

item.title: Tetris The Grand Master 4 -Absolute Eye-
item.description: Game Description Tetris The Grand Master 4 -Absolute Eye - marks the continuation of the TGM series, originating in the arcade halls. This fourth part goes after a 20-year break between the main parts of the series, representing new elements in the established formula. The project contains content designed both for beginners unfamiliar with the specific style of the series, and for gamers with extensive experience. Tetris The Grand Master 4 -Absolute Eye offers several passage options, including recently introduced ASUKA and Shiranui options.

item.title: Inayh - Life after Gods
item.description: Game Description Inayh - Life after Gods describes the journey of a lone warrior on split setting. The remnants of the once prosperous civilization now serve as a battlefield for warring groups, each of which fights for dominance over the ruins. Inaya, an orphaned exile, is looking for her lost tribe, faced with inexorable opponents and revealing forgotten truths. Its path runs through hostile landscapes, abandoned buildings and hidden shelters, where dangers and opportunities exist nearby.

item.title: Tuggowar
item.description: Game Description Tuggowar involves constructing a deck from a randomized set of cards, making each match unpredictable. Every time you play, you get the opportunity to experiment with new strategies, finding unexpected combinations that can lead to victory. Gamers often have to adapt on the fly, reacting to ever-changing dynamics. The variety in each match keeps the experience fresh even after long hours. What sets Tuggowar apart from many card games is the emphasis on creativity rather than following pre-made decks.

item.title: BLEACH Rebirth of Souls
item.description: Game Description BLEACH Rebirth of Souls invites users into a world where fate can be rewritten with one blow of the blade. This game brings to life the characters from the popular anime series, each armed with unique sword abilities that offer different styles. Whether you’re new to the franchise or are diving into the world of Soul Reapers for the first time, the title offers a dynamic combat system that lets you control the flow of battle.

item.title: Falling for yaoguais
item.description: Game Description In Falling for Yaoguais, the main character enters the entertainment park, which is controlled by supernatural creatures from Taiwanese folklore. Having settled in appearance to ordinary work, she finds out that this is a trap to attract people as food. The protagonist will have to be disguised as Yaoguay for a secret investigation of the conspiracy underlying the activities of the institution. The girl maneuverates in a brewing conflict between people and inhuman staff, trying to preserve her cover.

item.title: I Am Legion: Stand Survivors
item.description: Game Description I Am Legion: Stand Survivors combines combat and strategy, offering gamers a wide variety of choices. The central mechanic involves summoning powerful fighters, each with their own abilities, to fight waves of enemies. As users progress, they encounter various difficulties, including unlocking new characters and equipment. This allows for continuous development and adaptation of the game, adding an extra layer of complexity to the gameplay. The core loop of I Am Legion: Stand Survivors revolves around synthesizing and upgrading your warriors.

item.title: Deadly Heart Gambit
item.description: Game Description Deadly Heart Gambit is an intense card competition, where each card drawn can either extend the allotted time or bring the fatal ending closer. Participants in this fight will have to rely on memory and strategic thinking to avoid a fatal meeting with the Joker, which means an instant loss in the round. Defeat is awarded to the one who draws this single card. To win, you must carefully monitor the cards already played and wisely use the opportunity to skip your turn.

item.title: Anima Engine
item.description: Game Description Anima Engine is software that provides the tools to completely transform your personal computer desktop into a personalized digital space. Users play the role of designers who can revive a static environment using their own collections of animations, video clips and sound. Support for many modern formats has been implemented, including MP4 and WEBP, which allows you to integrate almost any multimedia files, turning the familiar interface into a dynamic and interactive environment that is fully controlled by its owner.

item.title: Dead Dragons
item.description: Game Description Dead Dragons launches history 100 years after the victory of people over the dragons - the events that allegedly brought the world. Now rumors about the return of these creatures encourage the protagonist to investigate the case of a mysterious girl associated with the dragon race. This task develops into a conflict that decides the fate of the whole world and raises the main question of the survival of one of the species in the upcoming confrontation.

item.title: Star Knightess aura
item.description: Game Description Star Knightess aura - Anime -Nella, the main character of which is a girl with an unusual name of the aura. She falls into a fantastic world called Roya. The heroine is cursed by the king of demons. Its task is to deal with otherworldly monsters every night. At the same time, it is very important not to lose yourself. The girl has insanity and she begins to consider herself a completely different person.

item.title: Endless Alice
item.description: Game Description endless alice - this is an adventure from a third person with an intriguing combination of elements of the Rowlaik and visual design, inspired by anime. Title invites gamers to explore a huge, constantly changing world, where each solution can determine their path. Six characters to choose from, each of which offers its own set of abilities and styles of battle, allow users to combine them in accordance with their style.

item.title: Threefold Recital
item.description: Game Description Threefold Recital invites gamers to move to bright eastern fantasy, where the overgrown city of Bluscles stands on the threshold of a new era. Once the city was warmed in the rays of the Golden Age, and now it is mired in political instability and tension. Title draws a picture of the world where ancient magic and modern technologies are intertwined, creating a unique mixture that drives the narrative forward.

item.title: FREEDOM WARS Remastered
item.description: Game Description FREEDOM WARS Remastered offers an updated take on a dystopian world where society has collapsed and survivors are trapped in vast prison cities called Panopticons. These prisons are not just physical structures, they symbolize the fall of humanity. The title puts you in the shoes of the Sinner - a man sentenced to an unimaginable punishment of a million years for simply existing. The only way to shorten this period is to participate in dangerous missions, often involving rescuing civilians from terrifying bio-weapons known as Reavers.

item.title: Desktop Mate
item.description: Game Description Desktop Mate is a software platform that brings interactive mascots to computer desktops. It allows users to interact with virtual characters that move freely around the screen. The platform uses advanced 3D technology to simulate realistic movements, creating the illusion that these characters exist in the user’s workspace. The process creates a sense of immersion, and the mascots demonstrate different behaviors and interactions. Users in Desktop Mate can customize their experience by adding new characters to the platform.

item.title: Victoria: La Primera
item.description: Game Description Victoria La Primera tests your wits by solving puzzles and overcoming physical obstacles based on the realities of the 16th century. Interaction with characters of the era and participation in events that shaped the course of maritime history create a unique educational experience. Players will navigate routes through previously uncharted seas, discovering secrets and new paths. Every decision made directly affects the further development of events, requiring the captain to think strategically and adapt to changing circumstances on a long and dangerous journey.

item.title: Anime City
item.description: Game Description Anime City transfers gamers to a bright 3D virtual Tokyo, inspired by anime culture. Title combines the mechanics of the visual novel and sandbox, creating an interactive environment, focused on everyday life, social interactions and school experience. Users stand in the place of a high school student, moving along a dynamic, fictitious city landscape, interacting with the characters, exploring key places and participating in various events. Title offers many ways to plunge into this detailed city - from clubs after lessons to public events and part -time work.

item.title: FANTASIAN Neo Dimension
item.description: Game Description FANTASIAN Neo Dimension is an updated version of the popular mobile game that combines traditional RPG mechanics with some fresh ideas. Users take on the role of Leo, a character who wakes up in a strange world with almost no memory of his past. However, this world is not a peaceful one: it is threatened by a mysterious mechanical infection known as Mechteria. In the role of Leo, the gamer will travel through a variety of landscapes, trying to piece together his lost memories and uncover the truth about the infection that threatens everything.

item.title: W.A.N.D. Project
item.description: Game Description W.A.N.D. Project is a fast-paced roguelike set in a futuristic Tokyo, where gamers take on the role of a young sorceress tasked with protecting the city from waves of alien creatures. The title combines bullet hell and spell mechanics, giving users the opportunity to experiment with magical elements and combine them to create powerful spells. The goal is simple: survive and become stronger by coming up with the best spell combinations and strategies to take down increasingly difficult enemies.

item.title: Midori no Kaori
item.description: Game Description Midori no Kaori is an adventure game based on the art of peaceful store management. In this relaxed environment, gamers will create and manage their own establishment, drawing on elements of Japanese culture to shape their vision. The title doesn’t focus on fast-paced action or intense competition, but rather encourages players to create a space that reflects their personal taste. There are no strict goals or deadlines, making it a refreshing alternative to many other games that prioritize speed or performance.

item.title: Take Me
item.description: Game Description Take Me is a title that is a distinct fusion of stealth, horror and dark humor. The story centers on Maria, a young woman who finds herself in an unexpected and somewhat strange situation. After attending a masquerade, Maria loses consciousness and wakes up in a strange situation - in the house of a mysterious man named Vitaly. From the very beginning, the gamer finds himself in the role of Maria, trying to get out of a place that seems both mysterious and dangerous.

item.title: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival
item.description: Game Description Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival is a delightful rhythm game in which users go on an exciting adventure with Don-chan, a cute drummer, and his new friend Kumo-kyun, an adorable cloud-like creature. The rhythmic escapade takes place in the city of Omiko, where the duo strives to rise to the level of taiko masters. The game offers gamers two modes: an interesting story mode with Don-chan and Kumo-kyun, and a rhythm-rich Taiko, which features 76 songs of various genres - from anime anthems to pop hits, classical compositions and original tracks.

item.title: PSYCHOPOPP GOLD
item.description: Game Description Psychopomp Gold - This is a remasted version of the popular horror game that sends gamers on a trip along terrible catacombs filled with strange creatures and hidden secrets. In the remaster there are new levels and modes that expand the concept of the original. Adding a third-person species changes the perspective, allowing users to navigate the environment differently. Each corner is fraught with a new test, because gamers must maintain vigilance, making their way through the dark depths.

item.title: Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven
item.description: Game Description Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven is a remake of the original 1993 role-playing game that has attracted the attention of players around the world. The story is set in the Varennes Empire and progresses through generations of emperors, starting with Leon and ending with his son Gerard. Gamers inherit not only the throne, but also abilities and quests, passing the tests that the Seven Heroes throw at them.

item.title: DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO
item.description: Game Description DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO, whose gameplay takes the legendary mechanics of the Budokai Tenkaichi series to a new level, invites you to feel the destructive power of the strongest warriors in the universe. The project is based on fast-paced 3D fights, featuring impressive visuals and authentic fighting techniques. Battles take place in interactive arenas that realistically react to every action of the fighters. Powerful energy attacks and character transformations cause massive destruction of the environment, leaving behind a veritable trail of debris and craters.

item.title: Hidden in My Paradise
item.description: Game Description Hidden in My Paradise is an adventure game with hidden objects that offers fascinating experience for players looking for a combination of research and creativity. The main character, Lali, goes on a journey with Fairy Crown, creating a bizarre atmosphere from the very beginning. The purpose of the duet is to find hidden objects scattered in various zones, each of which has its own unique taste. Such an environment encourages gamers to plunge into various conditions, to look for objects, solving small stories that accompany each mission.

item.title: Beloved Rapture
item.description: Game Description Beloved Rapture is a custom JRPG that combines modern themes with classic gameplay. Travel through beautiful landscapes, fight turn-based battles and uncover many secrets. This mid-length adventure balances the protagonist’s personal story with the larger threats facing Alexandria. The main focus is on the plot and the interpersonal relationships between the characters. Each hero must go through their own personal trials before facing the bosses in the following dungeons.

item.title: Sword Art Online FRACTURED DAYDream
item.description: Game Description Sword Art Online FRACTURED DAYDREAM gives gamers an unexpected call. This new part of the popular franchise is not a standard VR adventure. Here, familiar landscapes are spinning and turning, temporary lines collide, and past glory is mixed with new problems. Fasten the belts because the system failure in the main game program, Galaxia, throws characters from different stories together. In this project there is no mentality of a lone wolf.

item.title: Halluci-Sabbath of Koishi
item.description: Game Description Halluci-Sabbat of Koishi immerses users in a fantasy setting where they will have to take control of the monster Satori Komeiji Koishi, who is an adventurer and a trained soldier. During the adventure, the hero meets a human witch who is looking for rare ingredients to create potions. Traveling together, the protagonists stumble upon a dangerous mushroom family and undead that they have to fight. Players will explore the forest with miasma and encounter many opponents.

item.title: The Nameless: Slay Dragon
item.description: Game Description The Nameless: Slay Dragon is a turn-based role-playing adventure game that immerses gamers in a world of strategic combat and deep storytelling. In the center is a young protagonist who must take revenge on a powerful dragon. Users will have to go through a series of battles and clashes, each of which requires careful planning and tactical execution. The title emphasizes the importance of choice; every decision can change the course of the plot.

item.title: Class of '09: The Flip Side
item.description: Game Description Class of ‘09: The Flip Side is the final chapter of the visual novel series that follows the characters’ lives as they navigate their post-high school struggles. This installment puts the spotlight on Jack, a character who was previously seen in a supporting role. The adventure focuses on her experiences and the emotional difficulties she faces, which contrasts with the more light-hearted approach of the previous protagonist, Nicole. The narrative structure of Class of ‘09: The Flip Side allows gamers to make choices that affect the storyline and offers multiple endings depending on the decisions made.

item.title: TOUHOU GENSOU MAHJONG
item.description: Game Description TOUHOU GENSOU MAHJONG is not an ordinary mahjong game. Of course, the core mechanics remain the same - matching tiles, building chalks, challenging Riichi - but here’s the kicker: Touhou Project throws its huge cast of characters into the game. Over 120 familiar faces spanning two decades of history bring a new layer of strategy to the classic four-player format. Do you think you have everything figured out with Riichi?

item.title: LOLLIPOP CHAINSAW RePOP
item.description: Game Description Lollipop Chainsaw RePOP is a fast-paced hack-and-slash that follows the adventures of Juliet Starling, a high school cheerleader turned zombie hunter. Juliet will face a new wave of the undead and a mysterious outbreak that threatens her hometown. Armed with her trusty chainsaw, Juliet must fight her way through hordes of zombies, from classic Shamblers to more grotesque and dangerous creatures. The combat system is smooth and enjoyable, with a variety of combos and attacks to keep gamers on their toes.

item.title: DRAGON QUEST MONSTERS: The Dark Prince
item.description: Game Description DRAGON QUEST MONSTERS: The Dark Prince tells the story of Psaro, a young demiurge cursed by his father. He cannot harm creatures with monster blood, so he becomes a monster hunter. Psaro commands an army of monsters to take revenge on his father. He travels through Nadiria, a country with changing seasons. Psaro must find and recruit powerful monsters to fight alongside him. He is not alone. He is joined by the kind elf Rose and magic researcher Toilen Trubble.

item.title: Towerborne
item.description: Game Description Towerborne is an action-adventure game set in a world where humanity’s cities have been destroyed by a mysterious evil. The only refuge is the Bell Tower, a tower that holds secrets and dangers. Gamers take on the role of Ace, a hero tasked with protecting the inhabitants of the Belfry and uncovering the truth about the evil threatening humanity. Here gamers explore a huge world filled with various creatures and challenges.

item.title: Yars Rising
item.description: Game Description Yars Rising is an exciting adventure game that will take gamers on an exciting journey through a dystopian future. In the role of Emi Kimura, an experienced hacker, you have to infiltrate the mysterious QoTech corporation. This shadowy organization holds secrets that could potentially change the world. The gameplay is a delightful mixture of 2D platforming, stealth and hacking. As Amy, you’ll navigate intricate levels, dodging laser bars, outsmarting security drones, and solving challenging puzzles.

item.title: Arcane Blast
item.description: Game Description InArcane Blast you’ll find yourself wearing the fur boots of Adrian, a cat mage on a mission. This roguelike adventure throws you into a chaotic world filled with spells, enemies, and the constant threat of a cat’s life. Do you think you can handle it? This isn’t your average walk in the park, unless that park is filled with evil goblins and fire-breathing lizards. It’s all about reflexes here.

item.title: Ace Attorney Investigations Collection
item.description: Game Description Ace Attorney Investigations Collection, a collection of two games featuring the famous prosecutor Miles Edgeworth, invites users to step into his shoes and go on an exciting investigation. Unlike the courtroom drama of the original series, this collection focuses on the detective work that precedes the trial. Gamers will have to collect evidence, interview witnesses and solve intricate mysteries using logical deduction. The collection includes various quality of life improvements to make gameplay more enjoyable.

item.title: BAKERU
item.description: Game Description The adventure ofBAKERU, set in fantasy Japan, revolves around a tanuki boy named Bakeru. His mission is to restore order after the chaos unleashed by Oracle Saitaro and his Festival Army. Armed with a mystical drum, Buckaroo sets out on a journey to free Japan from evil spirits. BAKERU takes place across 50 scenes inspired by Japanese prefectures. This vibrant world combines modern Japan with echoes of period dramas to create a captivating backdrop.

item.title: Kamikaze Lasplanes
item.description: Game Description Kamikaze Lassplanes is a visual novel that combines the plot of a novel with the action of a shoot-‘em-up game.
